HOME.title: home
HOME.htmlContent: This is bold text and this is italic
HOME.sayHello: Hello {{name}}! Welcome to your new app!

CARD1.title: Be Creative!
CARD1.subtitle: Greet your users.
CARD1.text: Your app lives here! Every time someone opens your app, this page is displayed. So build the main function here.

CARD2.title: International!
CARD2.subtitle: Simple and fast!
CARD2.text: ngx-translate supports you in placing different languages or even systems here. In addition, the system can also be used to quickly and easily adapt strings for the complete app.

CARD1.title: Be creative!
CARD1.subtitle: this is your about view
CARD1.text: Inform the user about privacy, provide support information or show the current app version.

CARD2.title: Help?!
CARD2.subtitle: Make your app even better!
CARD2.text: With the Ionic Framework you can develop beautiful UIs and do so with already existing components - adapted to any system.
